snippet.title: War Heli - Atari ST
snippet.description:
In this video, War Heli, released in 1987 for the Atari ST by Argonics.
Two Swiss crackers M. Heubi and M. Köhler developed this game for the Atari ST,. a vertical shoot 'em up where the player pilots a helicopter and he has to destroy all enemy tanks. He has to be careful not to hit any ambulances or his score wil be reset to zero. 
The game is all here, but for mid '80s standards it has very colorful graphics, detailed backgrounds, smooth scrolling and nice medium-sized sprites. The audio is ok and you can adjust the volume while playing if the main track becomes boring. The playability is ok, War Heli came with a good feature: you could save the game to the disk and continue later. This balanced the frustrating fact that you must go back to the beginning of the level if you get hit by the enemy's bullets,
Here you'll find gameplay of level one and part of level two.

All footage taken from original hardware machines and upscaled to 1080P.

Let me know what do you think about the video in the comments below but, most important, Enjoy!!!
If you liked the video, please consider giving a thumb's up and maybe also subscribe. 

Thanks for watching.
